title: Kings Mountain National Military Park: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        America the Beautiful National Parks and Federal Recreation Lands Passes  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, America the Beautiful National Parks and Federal Recreation Lands Passes   If you are interested in obtaining an America the Beautiful National Parks and Federal Recreation Lands Pass (Senior Pass, Access Pass, Every Kid in a Park Pass, etc.), please call  864-936-7921 to ensure that a qualified park staff member is present.
